#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

 int main()
 {
    long long int n;
while(cin>>n)
{
//cin>>n;
    int i=1;
    long long int k=9,ans=0,r=0;


    if((char)n=='#')
        break;
    while(n>=(k*i))
    {
        ans+=k;
        n-=k*i;
        i++;
        k*=10;

    }

    r=n%i;
    ans+=n/i;
    if(r!=0)
        cout<<"Impossible!\n";
    else
    cout<<ans<<"\n";
    }
 return 0;
 }
